channel.title: CVE Feed for Accusoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Accusoft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-21938|2024-09-17T02:05:50.758Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Palette box parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-21945|2024-09-17T00:50:58.802Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: Two heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the TIFF parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.This heap-based buffer oveflow takes place trying to copy the second 12 bits from local variable.
